title: Weekly Promo and Webinar Thread
text:
Vendors, please put self-promoting posts or webinar information in this thread. Threads that are posted elsewhere will be removed.

**Please do not use URL shorteners. Reddit doesn't like these and your posts will be automatically removed by the auto moderator. Only include direct posts to your site.**

It's fine to post if you did last week - if the group doesn't want to see it again, your comment will just get downvoted :)

comments.text:

Do you know that?

* MSPs incorporating DMARC into their service offerings have reported a 15% growth in customer retention rates.

If you‚Äôre an MSP aiming to boost your revenue and customer loyalty, EasyDMARC is the perfect solution. Our email authentication platform simplifies domain management, offering features like organization control, domain grouping, and access management.

Moreover, we offer a complete sales and marketing enablement program to enhance your DMARC sales, all on a scalable platform with a flexible pay-as-you-go pricing model. Choose EasyDMARC to protect your customers from phishing and supercharge their email deliverability!

# Benefits

* Increased revenue without new client acquisition spending

* Reduce IT support costs due to small overhead and manual labor elimination
* Ensure substantial business growth due to the fact that the platform scales with you

* Improve customer retention and satisfaction due to timely reports and a vast knowledge base
* Get a competitive advantage by automating daily tasks with our cloud-native DMARC platform

Contact our dedicated DMARC MSP professional today to learn more about our services and get a quote based on your needs.

# [The AI Service Coordinator for your MSP.](https://www.giantrocketship.com/?utm_source%3Dreddit.com%2Fr%2Fautotask)
Our value proposition at [Giant Rocketship](https://www.giantrocketship.com/?utm_source=reddit.com/r/autotask) is easy: *We increase the profitability of your MSP helpdesk*.

We do that by:

‚úÖ **Reducing labor cost per ticket**

‚úÖ **Reducing administrative grind**

‚úÖ **Reducing ticket time-to-close**

**[Rocketship](https://www.giantrocketship.com/?utm_source%3Dreddit.com%2Fr%2Fautotask) modernizes the ticket lifecycle in Autotask**, seamlessly integrating intelligent assignment, optimized scheduling, on-demand escalations, and SLA-driven work queuing and AI-driven predictions. 

Our software works best with MSPs that have 5 or more techs -- that's when "self-dispatching" costs more than it saves. At 25-30 techs, Giant Rocketship enables a single dispatcher to scale to 50 techs without missing a beat.

It's not Autotask or Rocketship, it's ***Autotask+Rocketship*** for high-performing MSP helpdesks. Join the growing ranks of MSPs that deploy Autotask+Rocketship as the foundation of their support stack.

We provide a 30-day free trial.

[Schedule Online Demo](https://www.giantrocketship.com/schedule-demo/?utm_source=reddit.com/r/autotask)

ConnectWise Manage support is coming in late Q4!
‚Äã

Is this you?

* Need to manage hundreds or thousands of TOTP 2FA tokens?
* Want to set access levels per TOTP 2FA token, and not per group, vault, etc?
* Want more insights into 2FA token use, e.g. with a detailed audit log?
* Don't want to store \_everything\_ in IT Glue/Hudu/your password manager?

Now you can!

[üëâ **Daito is 2FA as a service, a web-based TOTP 2FA authenticator for MSPs, SMBs and internal IT teams.**](https://www.daito.io/?utm_campaign=msp-promo-2025-01-20)

Securely share access, no phone needed! 2FA tokens only, not a password manager!

Popular features:

* Fully web-based, use from any browser, no app needed.
* See which user used what 2FA token when in the searchable audit log
* Limit to read-only access possible: You decide if users get read-only access to 2FA tokens, or if they can access the 2FA secret key as well (great for limiting access of freelancers & agencies)
* Not a password manager, Daito is only for 2FA authentication
* Easy imports: easily add accounts by copy-pasting 2FA secret keys, scanning or uploading QR codes
* 5-second-migration from Google Authenticator (simply scan the migration code for migration)
* Export and backup all your 2FA seeds as CSV
* Easy management of groups of users and accounts
* SAML SSO (and not only for enterprise tiers!)

[üëâ **Visit now and start a free 14-day trial and test with your entire team!**](https://www.daito.io/?utm_campaign=msp-promo-2025-01-20)

Shared 2FA, simplified!
